name: group.setRotationSpeedEach()
content:
Clockwise rotation change in degrees per frame of every sprite in the group. 

A positive value will rotate clockwise, a negative value will rotate counterclockwise. Must be used with the `draw()` function containing a `drawSprites()`.

The default rotationSpeed is 0. All sprite properties can be both accessed and updated.
return_value: No return value. Changes output in the display after drawSprites() is called.
short_description: Clockwise rotation change in degrees per frame of every sprite in the group.
tips:
- Groups of sprites all have the same functions and you use the dot notation (combining the name of the group, followed by a dot, with the function name) to call the function for that group of sprites.
- Any changes to the properties of a sprite will not be seen until after `drawSprites()` is called.
